__prompts__.project_slug: Confirm a valid django project name
__prompts__.description: Enter a description for your project
__prompts__.model_lower: Confirm the 'model' in the lowercase form
__prompts__.model_singular: Confirm the 'model' in the singular form
__prompts__.model_singular_lower: Confirm the 'model_lower' in the singular form
__prompts__.use_sqlite_local_env: Would you like to start with SQLite?
__prompts__.node_version: Select the Node version for the frontend
__prompts__.pages_folder_name: Select pages folder name for the frontend
__prompts__.api_mock: Select the frotend library to simulate the backend (api mock)
__prompts__.use_github_actions_CI: Would you like to keep the Github Actions (CI-CD)?
__prompts__.keep_vscode_settings: Would you like to keep the VSCode Settings?
__prompts__.keep_vscode_devcontainer: Would you like to keep the VSCode DevContainer?
__prompts__.docker_usage: Would you like to use Docker?
__prompts__.deploy_to: Where would you like to target your deployment?
